scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:5000/health && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && npm run format || true
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd backend && npm run typecheck || true
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.ci: npm run lint:frontend && npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run build && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
